channel.title: About on Hansen Johnson
channel.description: Recent content in About on Hansen Johnson

item.description: About me My name is Hansen Johnson. I’m a PhD student at Dalhousie University, and a guest student at the Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution where I work with Dr. Chris Taggart and Dr. Mark Baumgartner respectively. I study baleen whale acoustics and habitat ecology in the Northwest Atlantic. My goals for this website are to 1) share some aspects of my research and 2) contribute some code and advice to the vast repository of online knowledge that I so often turn to for help.
